attributes.action: bring our troops home from iraq and afghanistan
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
i am appealing to anyone to sign the petition to get our troops home from this terrible war zone, too many of our troops are being brutally killed or helped captive, this is not on! 
recently i saw in the news that 4 young soldiers were killed two of which are the same age as myself, this can not go on.
Please i urge you to sign!

thank you for your time

*Tracy*

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
